channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Going To The Dogs
channel.desc: The story of Wimbledon Greyhound Stadium which drew crowds of 25,000 in its heyday. After it closed in 2017 just two of London's once-27 greyhound race tracks remain operating.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston enter the home baking section of the Henley Show. They also visit Tamsin Borlase whose organic farm supplies local restaurants.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Cheadle to design a safe garden for pastor and PhD student Joy to relax, read, entertain, study and pray in.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan meets Anne and Mike who has dementia. The layout of the house and garden means Mike is finding it difficult to cope and risks never leaving his home.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: In Wales and a London dungeon, Alice explores the world of BDSM. She also meets a Surrey couple where the dom 'owns' her sub's body 24/7. Contains scenes of a sexual nature.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Intimate Games
channel.desc: A psychology teacher instructs his university class to write down their sexual fantasies. The students then take their chance to make these desires a reality.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Doomwatch
channel.desc: Scientists investigate a remote island plagued by mutations caused by toxic waste, uncovering a disturbing government cover-up.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.

channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping programming bringing you a selection of innovative products.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Flo are in Sheffield to create a garden with a forest feel for couple Karen and Kathryn, lovers of the outdoors.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston visit and compete in country shows. The chefs are in Hawkshead - famous for being home to Beatrix Potter.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: It is day two of top chefs Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston's culinary road trip. They are entering the savoury tartlets category of the Wensleydale show.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: It is day three of professional chefs Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston's foodie road trip. This time they are in Glendale, inspiration for Postman Pat's Greendale.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston arrive in the north Devon fishing village of Clovelly, where they take on the locals in the Clovelly crab and lobster festival.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. Alex and Peter go down a copper mine, just a few hundred yards from their cottage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. During World War II, a commando outfit disguised as an Italian Army unit is parachuted behind Axis lines. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Assassination Bureau
channel.desc: Action. Would-be journalist Sonya Winter investigates the Assassination Bureau, a mysterious organization. Ollie Reed and Diana Rigg star.
